text: Kamo Stéphane Bayi (born 17 August 1996) is an Ivorian professional footballer, who plays as a forward for Bhawanipore FC in Calcutta Football League. ==Career== Bayi was born in the Ivory Coast, but started his career in Nigeria with Akwa Starlets. In 2016, he moved to India to play for Calcutta Football League side George Telegraph. After the Kolkata season was complete, Bayi moved to another Indian state, Goa, to play for Goa Professional League side Salgaocar. ===Aizawl=== On 2 January 2017, Bayi signed with Aizawl of the I-League. He made his debut for the club on 7 January in their league opener against East Bengal. He started and played the whole match, as Aizawl drew 1–1. ===Mohun Bagan AC=== In June 2017, Bayi signed for Mohun Bagan AC for the Calcutta Football League. ===Gokulam Kerala FC=== On 19 November 2017, it was announced that Kamo has signed for the new entrants of I-League Gokulam Kerala FC for 2017-18 season. ==Personal life== His brother, Bazie Armand, is also a professional footballer.
